ygData.subject: Re: crookstinger.  Magic weapon?
ygData.msgSnippet: yes it can hit creatures that require magic to hit melee.  And look for CrookStinger the big ass wasp in lesser faydark.  There is also the huge Fae Drake
ygData.messageBody:
yes it can hit creatures that require magic to hit melee. And look for
"CrookStinger" the big ass wasp in lesser faydark. There is also the huge
Fae Drake Old Dimmshimmer and some sort of queen Giant spider (named
spider...not sure what she loots).

-Ziffnab

-----Original Message-----
From: McCartney, Michael R [mailto:Michael.McCartney2@...]
Sent: Wednesday, April 28, 1999 3:58 PM
To: 'eq_wizards@onelist.com'
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: crookstinger. Magic weapon?


From: "McCartney, Michael R" <Michael.McCartney2@...>

I know it does 4 dmg only with a decent delay.. but can it hit magic
creatures? Also.. what "named Wasp" has it? ..and where in lesser Fay can
I find it?

Thanks,

Drev
